plot: Holocaust survivor and author Inge Deutschkron's story comes to the screen in this film chronicling 70 years of her life and career.
title: Daffke...! Die vier Leben der Inge D.
plot_es: Holocaust survivor and author Inge Deutschkron's story comes to the screen in this film chronicling 70 years of her life and career.
original_name: Daffke...! Die vier Leben der Inge D.
plot_en: Holocaust survivor and author Inge Deutschkron's story comes to the screen in this film chronicling 70 years of her life and career.
